Sound

renderpass.code:
#define Cc(c) U.x-=.5; T+= U.x<.0||U.x>1.||U.y<0.||U.y>1. ?vec4(0): textureGrad(iChannel3, U/16. + fract( vec2(c, 15-c/16) / 16.), dFdx(U/16.),dFdy(U/16.) )
#define initMsg vec4 T = vec4(0)
#define endMsg  return length(T.yz)==0. ? 0. : T.x
